title: TrailHeads Men’s Power Cap - 4-Way Stretch Skull Cap
features: 4 - WAY STRETCH - Highly breathable polyester / spandex blend fabric delivers snug fitting performance.  Brushed finish feels great against your skin and ensures a comfortable fit while working to wick moisture during your workouts

LIGHTWEIGHT and WARM - With a double layer earband, our black beanie adds insulation where you need it most while remaining lightweight and easy to stow away in a pocket. Machine washable. One size fits most.
ALL PURPOSE PERFORMANCE - Water resistant fabric keeps you warm and dry during workouts.
HELMET FRIENDLY - Can be worn alone or works well as a helmet liner for skiing, snowboarding or biking on days where you need an extra layer of insulation

TRAIL TESTED GUARANTEE - Your complete satisfaction is our goal. If you’re not happy with your purchase, let us know and we'll provide a replacement or refund - no fine print, no time limit. Nothing but our commitment to do what it takes to satisfy our customers.
description: The perfect choice for cold weather aerobic activities - either worn alone or under a helmet. Excels as both a source of insulation and moisture-wicking base layer.
